forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
